import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' const MealItem = props =>{ useContext const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addToCartHandler = amount =>{}; return(

  • {props.name}

    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem;
